From: KSLawdogg@...

The Oblitercons/Sixshot/Shockwave/Serpentor/Demon Wulf/Dark Claw/Flesh 
Ripper/Unitron:




Dark One dive bombed, firing off two missiles at the Mafia Base, transforming 
to biped mode, landing on the ground with ease, plasma rifle in hand.  He 
activated his comm. unit.  "All Oblitercons, meet up with me, prepare to 
begin formation."

---

Breakdown raised his launcher, firing off a grenade at the Mafia Base.  

---

"Go for the base!  There's no one left to fight us!  It's only a matter of 
time until the flames of destruction defeat them!" Pyro chuckled madly, 
firing off three fire balls at the Mafia Base.

---

Hiss fired off three fusion blasts from his cannon at the Mafia Base.

---

Scavenger fired off 25 explosive rounds at the Mafia Base, raising his right 
arm and firing off a missile from his rocket launcher.

---

Demon Wulf fired off a blade missile at the Mafia Base, simultaneously firing 
off 25 rapid red blasts from his optic sensors.

---

Flesh Ripper fired off 10 rapid optic blasts at the Mafia Base.

---

Dark Claw formed another black orb with the same effect of a bomb, throwing 
the explosive ball of energy at the Mafia Base.  "They shall perish."

---

Sixshot slowly stood up, catching a dozen laser blasts in his armored chest, 
sending him collapsing to his back.

---

Shockwave pulled up after letting his volley of lasers off at Sixshot.  
"Foo--ARGH." Shockwave crashed into the ground after catching laser blasts in 
his afterburners.

---

Unitron laughed to himself, firing off two missiles at the Mafia Base.
